name: @ag-common/utils
description: common utilities for javascript project based on nextjs, nestjs project where interaction with discovery services required

scripts.publish: cp package.json rollup.config.js ./build/ && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.//build: npx swc src -d dist --strip-leading-paths && cp -rf ./types/** ./package.json dist/

author: Amitkumar Chauhan
